title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding.

Description: When a key is left blank, externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
OB: When the key is left blank, externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, it should be possible to leave the key blank, but it must have a valid value. When the key is blank with a valid value, it should externalize in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Set the key for externalized text in the chart title to be blank but with a valid value.
